

```
cargo run init context.json

Context { action: InitAction, address: aa00000000000000000000000000000000112233, sender: bb00000000000000000000000000000000223344, ctx: 0x7fbdde402a30 }
set owner: bb00000000000000000000000000000000223344
```

```
cargo run call context.json

Context { action: CallAction, address: aa00000000000000000000000000000000112233, sender: bb00000000000000000000000000000000223344, ctx: 0x7fb824c02a30 }
get owner: bb00000000000000000000000000000000223344
```
